title: Tesla closes $2.7 billion capital raise
text: Tesla said on Wednesday it closed its $2.7 billion offering of stock and convertible notes and that it was over-subscribed, giving the electric carmaker much needed cash as it ramps up production. The electric car-maker sold about $860 million in shares and $1.84 billion in debt, after the underwriters exercised their option to buy 15.
